params.attributes: Array of attribute names to disclose

getCitizenAttestation(address).details: Get detailed verification information for a citizen

isPassportUsed(bytes32).details: Check if a passport hash has already been used

params.passportHash: Hash to check for previous use

returns._0: True if passport has been used for verification

isVerifiedCitizen(address).details: Check if a citizen is verified through Self Protocol

returns._0: True if citizen is verified and verification is still valid

phoneToWallet(bytes32).details: Create a wallet address from phone number (Self Connect feature)

verifyAgeRequirement(address,uint256).details: Verify age requirement without revealing exact age

returns._0: True if citizen meets the age requirement

verifyCitizenship(address,bytes2).details: Verify citizenship without revealing passport details

returns._0: True if citizen is from the required country

verifyIdentity(address,bytes).details: Verify an identity proof submitted by a citizen

params.citizen: Address of the citizen claiming identity

walletToPhone(address).details: Reverse lookup: get phone hash from wallet address
